mapper.select: SELECT id, date, weather, temperatures, precipitation, microDust, windSpeed, createdAt, updatedAt FROM weatherhistory ORDER BY date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weatherhistory (date, weather, temperatures, precipitation, microDust, windSpeed, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{date}, #{weather}, #{temperature}, #{precipitation}, #{microDust}, #{windSpeed}, NOW(), NOW())
